title: Moving using Minimap.
body:
I have been able to right click a part of the minimap to move there since... as long as I can remember.
My GFs PC froze while she was playing LoL, so I loaded LoL up on my PC while she fixed her problem... 

During the game I noticed she cannot move using the minimap, I had a look through the options but nothing caught my attention as a way to enable it.

Where is that option hiding? (it's probably front and centre in the options and I just didn't look hard enough)
